Alert Criteria: Fuel supply emergencies that could impact electric power system adequacy or reliability.
Firm load shedding of 100 Megawatts or more implemented under emergency operational policy.

Area Affected: New Jersey: Pennsylvania: Texas: California: Illinois: Colorado:
Alert Criteria: Cyber event that could potentially impact electric power system adequacy or reliability.
Unexpected Transmission loss within its area, contrary to design, of three or more Bulk Electric System Facilities caused by a common disturbance (excluding successful automatic reclosing).
Loss of electric service to more than 50,000 customers for 1 hour or more

Physical threat to its Facility excluding weather or natural disaster related threats, which has the potential to degrade the normal operation of the Facility. Or suspicious device or activity at its Facility.
